feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.50.13: Expiring File Download Links & Better Session Reset
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

When a push contains attached files:

  • Unique download links are generated each time the push is viewed
  • Each file download link expires after 5 minutes
  • A countdown timer shows the remaining time until expiration

  • Time Limited Download Links (#2617) @pglombardo
  • Delete session cookie and reset session on logout. (#2903) @pglombardo

:rocket: Features

  • Reconstitute "stable" tag in git (#3072) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1048.0 to 1.1049.0 (#3070) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump json from 2.9.1 to 2.10.1 (#3069) @dependabot[bot]
  • Bump esbuild from 0.24.0 to 0.25.0 (#3067) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump brakeman from 6.2.2 to 7.0.0 (#2951) @dependabot[bot]

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot[bot], @pglombardo and dependabot[bot]

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.50.13

..and go to http://localhost:5100

:link: Useful Links

  • Documentation
  • Docker Hub

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.50.16: Dockerfile Update, Resolve Warning
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Fix Warning: parser/current is loading parser/ruby34 (#3076) @pglombardo
  • Fix: Add missing underscore (#3081) @pglombardo
  • Docker: Build javascript in stage 1 (#3075) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1049.0 to 1.1050.0 (#3078) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump standard from 1.44.0 to 1.45.0 (#3079) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop from 1.70.0 to 1.71.2 (#3077) @dependabot[bot]

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.50.17: New /up health check endpoint; IPs Link to iplocation.io
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Add /up healthcheck endpoint (#3083) @pglombardo
